text: Mini Israel () is a miniature park located in Ayalon Valley, near Latrun, Israel. The park is in shape of the star of David. It has 385 models over and a small shopping mall and exhibition hall. The park opened in 2002 and was officially opened on April 7, 2003. == Other websites == * Mini Israel - Official website Category:Museums in Israel Category:Parks in Israel Category:Central District (Israel)
title: Mini Israel
